page.description: Return the number of bytes in the blob.
page.original:
.SIZE() Syntax Size as N = .SIZE() Description The .SIZE() method returns the Size of a blob in bytes. Example The following example shows the size as 6 because it was initialized from a six character string ("Alpha" contains an invisible NULL terminating character). dim bb as B bb = "Alpha" ? bb.size() = 6.000000
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
